sentences.en: He kept me waiting an unconscionable time.
sentences.cn: 他叫我等得太久,这是不合理的.

sentences.en: He takes an unconscionable time eating.
It is unconscionable to blame cheap Chinese imports for the bubble.
sentences.cn: 指责廉价的中国进口导致泡沫太没良心.

sentences.en: It would unconscionable to deviate from it.
sentences.cn: 偏离它就是非常不合理的.

sentences.en: People do things, the most important point is unconscionable not to do!
sentences.cn: 人做事情, 最重要的一点是不要昧着良心做事!

sentences.en: The demands are unconscionable and impossible to meet.
sentences.cn: 这些要求是不合理的也不可能的到满足.

sentences.en: The man had some merit, but much unconscionable evil in him.
sentences.cn: 这家伙是有些长处的, 但是也有着不少丧天害理的地方.

sentences.en: The war caused an unconscionable amount of suffering.
sentences.cn: 战争造成了太多的苦难。

sentences.en: To empower courts to give relief in certain contracts found to be unconscionable.
sentences.cn: 本条例旨在授权法庭就某些经裁定属不合情理的合约给予济助.

sentences.en: What we are doing by glomorizing smoking is unconscionable.
sentences.cn: 而我们这种把吸烟美化的行为是昧着良心的.

words.tran_cn: 不合理的；昧着良心的；肆无忌惮的；过度的

trans.tran_cn: 昧着良心的，不合理的，过分的，没良心
trans.tran_en: much more than is reasonable or acceptable
